qas.question: Along with industrial and medical, in what applications is infrared radiation used?
What technology is used by night-vision devices?
What discipline uses infrared telescopes to see through molecular clouds?
What color shift indicates that space objects date from the early days of the universe?
What devices are used to observe insulated system heat loss?
What technology allows infrared thermal imaging cameras to observe people or animals without being detected?
What technology is used by night vision devices to observe changing blood flow in the skin?
What science discipline uses infrared thermal-imaging cameras to penetrate dusty regions of space?
Along with industrial and medical, in what applications is infrared astronomy used?
What type of radiation is used to detect heat loss in insulated systems?

context: <b9_0>Infrared radiation<b9_0/> is used in industrial, <a0_0><b8_0>scientific<b8_0/><a0_0/>, and medical applications. Night-vision devices using <a1_0><b5_0><b6_0>active near-infrared illumination<b6_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/> allow people or animals to be observed without the observer being detected. <a2_0><b7_0>Infrared astronomy<b7_0/><a2_0/> uses sensor-equipped telescopes to penetrate dusty regions of space, such as molecular clouds; detect objects such as planets, and to view highly <a3_0>red<a3_0/>-shifted objects from the early days of the universe. <a4_0>Infrared thermal-imaging cameras<a4_0/> are used to detect heat loss in insulated systems, to observe changing blood flow in the skin, and to detect overheating of electrical apparatus.
